Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. This product, tailored specifically to meet your unique needs, carries a significant personal value to me due to its innovative features and high-quality craftsmanship. Given its exceptional capabilities and benefits, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This offer is designed to provide you with the best possible deal while ensuring a fair return for my investment in developing this product.

Please consider this proposal carefully. I am confident that the product will exceed your expectations and bring substantial benefits to your business. If you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss how we can collaborate on this exciting venture.

Best regards,
Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
